definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :1Ch 1:51 chief, chiliarch (denom. fr. II. [[אֶלֶף]] v. Di Ge 36:15)—´[[א]] abs. Ge 36:15 +; pl. cstr. [[אַלּוּפֵי]] ([[אַלֻּפֵי]]) Ex 15:15 +; sf. [[אַלּוּפֵיהֶם]] Ge 36:19, Ge 36:30—chief (tribal) of Edom Ge 36:15 (5 t.) + 38 t. Ge 36 (P); Ex 15:15 (E) 1Ch 1:51 (4 t.) + 9 t.; of Judah Zec 12:5, Zec 12:6; so [[אַלֻּף]] Zec 9:7 (in sim.)
